name: HONEY MYRTLE ROOM SPRAY 100ml
description:
A truly natural room freshener that brings the true fragrance of the west australian bush into your home.
Essential oil of Melaleuca teretifolia commonly known as 'Banbar' or 'Marsh Honey Myrtle' this tea tree is native to south western Australia.
We source our honey Myrtle oil right here in the south west !

Honey myrtle has the highest Citral content of all the Melaleucas.
Due to the oils great antiseptic properties and sweet light citrus tones the oil is fantastic to use as a deodorizer.

purified water, honey myrtle essential oil

name: TRAVELLERS / GIFT PACK
description:
✿ great for travellers!
✿ great for gifts!

✿ value = $34 + free slide zip bag

4 x 100ml PET bottles 
1 x 50ml PET bottle


✿body lotion 100ml
Tranquillita products are made with Australian extra virgin olive oil which is high in antioxidants, including vitamin E and is especially beneficial to soothe dry skin. Sweet & exotic, the deep woody tones of West Australian Sandalwood to calm, relax & help ease the irritation of dry skin. Lavender to help ease the discomfort of sunburn & insect bites.

✿hand wash shower gel 100ml
Our castile hand wash is made from extra virgin olive oil, coconut & castor oils. It gently cleans without stripping away the natural oils from the skin. Scented with essential oils of West Australian sandalwood & lavender. It is perfect for sensitive skins & noses.

✿Rose Hydrosol 50ml
great to use on a plane, for car travel or office to stay hydrated, and refreshed. Softening, soothing rose hydrosolcan be used as a toner or as a moisturising mist at any time. Hydrosols are the condensation that is collected during the steam distillation process used to extract essential oils.

✿shampoo 100ml
Our shampoo is made with Australian extra virgin olive oil, coconut & castor oils. It gently cleans the hair without stripping away the natural oils from the scalp. Scented with essential oils of West Australian sandalwood & lavender, it is suitable for all hair types & is perfect for sensitive skins & noses.

✿hair conditioner 100ml
Our hair conditioner is made from natural vegetable based ingredients & scented with pure essential oils of West Australian sandalwood & lavender. Suitable for all hair types, our light conditioner is perfect for sensitive skins & noses. It can safely be left in the hair for extra conditioning if needed.

name: SHAMPOOCH FOR DOGS 250ML
description: SHAMPOOCH Our absolutely natural shampoo is lightly scented with Australian natives Lemon Myrtle, Kunzea & Rosalina for insect repelling, calming, easing of skin irritations & insect bites. Perfect for the sensitive noses & skins of your faithful friends. i have had great success using as a flea 'treatment' simply by lathering up the coat for a few minutes which suffocates the fleas .... in my humble opinion this is just as effective as chemicals to kill them without the harm to your dog and you that they cause !! this is exactly the same shampoo base we use for our people shampoo, just a smaller percentage of and different essential oils for those extra sensitive noses ! i use it myself 'cause i love the smell :) Our handcrafted shampoo is 'cooked' in the Tranquillita kitchen the old fashioned way from only extra virgin olive oil, coconut oil & castor oil, with lye to saponify & scented with pure essential oils. It gently cleans the hair without stripping away the natural oils from the skin, perfect for sensitive skins & noses. ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ customer response ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ "I purchased some of the above product at the Vasse market in early February. I am pleased to say the shampoo is very good in that it removes the "doginess" from Tuppy's coat and also gives her a very good sheen which lasts almost till the next bath. So, we are all happy especially as Tup is rather fond of our bed after midnight rather than her own!! Where can I purchase the next bottle of shampoo? Thank you for your product. I wish you well. Betty" ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ NOT FOR CATS INCI ingredients list for shampoo base: sodium olivate, sodium cocoate, sodium castorate, acacia senegal. postage = $6 alone $1 with another item within australlia
